name: Ivan R.

rows.title: Overview
rows.description:
Worked at Quorum and held the position of Team Lead. Project types:
• Public affairs software.
• Various projects in Ruby and Python.

rows.title: Technologies
rows.description: RoR 4, sidekiq, Django, Flask, FastApi, Airflow, Postgres, ElasticSearch 5,6,7, Rmq, Redis, ReactJS, node scripts, Docker, AWS, Kubernetis

rows.title: Common tasks
rows.description:
Responsibilities as a Team Lead:
• Setting team goals, defining product requirements & ensuring goals and KPIs are met.
• Creating tasks, setting prioritization, maintaining executions, leading sprint plannings and 1:1 with team members.
• Participate in candidates selections and interviews.
• Introducing and ramping new members.
• Collaborating with DevOPS, managers, engineers, designers, cs managers.
Responsibilities as a Developer:
• Develop new features and support old infrastructure.
• Deployments and releases.
• Improve system performance, response time, pg queries, different ElasticSearch optimizations.
• Reduced costs of rds, ec2,es, rmq, instances AWS.

rows.title: Technologies
rows.description: RoR 4, sidekiq, Flask, Airflow, Postgres, ElasticSearch 5, Rmq, Redis, ReactJS, Docker, AWS, Kubernetes

rows.title: Common tasks
rows.description:
• Develop new features and support old infrastructure.
• Perform duties, deployments and releases.
• Fix bugs.
